thread.title: Celgene’s Buybacks Are Coming Up Empty

author: Charley Grant
title: Celgene’s Buybacks Are Coming Up Empty
text:
Celgene is opening its wallet yet again, but to what end?
The struggling biotech giant announced Thursday that it plans to spend $2 billion on an accelerated stock repurchase. That is about 4% of the company’s market value as of Wednesday’s closing price.
Celgene’s shares rose early Thursday as they typically do after such announcements,...
